CustomField.description: Check this box in order to sync badges from Trailhead The first time you check the box and save the record it will sync all Trailhead badges for this user If you uncheck the box it will delete all the related Trailhead badge records
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Check this box in order to sync badges from Trailhead The first time you check the box and save the record it will sync all Trailhead badges for this user If you uncheck the box it will delete all the related Trailhead badge records
CustomField.label: Monitor Trailhead Badges
